kun reading compounds: 其れ【それ】that (indicating an item or person near the listener, the action of the listener, or something on their mind), it, that time, then, there (indicating a place near the listener), you
其れから【それから】and then, after that
其の【その】that (something or someone distant from the speaker, close to the listener; actions of the listener, or ideas expressed or understood by the listener), the, um..., er..., uh...
その上【そのうえ】in addition, furthermore, above (which), on top of (which)
